attributes.action: Can you tell us, PLEASE, why you just don't get it about what it is we object to over our membership of the EU.
attributes.additional_details: And, Mr Slippery we really don't give a rat's backside what your opinion is.  Just give us a referendum on IN or OUT - NOW, NOW, NOW.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:

Petition Title: EU Referendum In 2015

Created by: Peter Fenny

Closing: 04/02/2015
